Uses of Class
lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.Coin

    • Uses of Coin in lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

      Methods in lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator with parameters of type Coin 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DeliveryChuteSimulator.acceptCoin(Coin coin)
      Tells this delivery chute to deliver the indicated coin.
      void CoinReceptacleSimulator.acceptCoin(Coin coin)
      Causes the indicated coin to be added to the receptacle if it has space.
      void CoinRackSimulator.acceptCoin(Coin coin)
      Causes the indicated coin to be added into the rack.
      void AbstractCoinAcceptor.acceptCoin(Coin coin)
      Instructs the device to take the coin as input.
      void CoinSlotSimulator.addCoin(Coin coin)
      Tells the coin slot that the indicated coin is being inserted.
      void CoinRackListener.coinAdded(CoinRackSimulator rack, Coin coin)
      Announces that the indicated coin has been added to the indicated coin rack.
      void CoinReceptacleListener.coinAdded(CoinReceptacleSimulator receptacle, Coin coin)
      An event that announces that the indicated coin has been added to the indicated receptacle.
      void CoinSlotListener.coinRejected(CoinSlotSimulator coinSlotSimulator, Coin coin)
      An event announcing that the indicated coin has been returned.
      void CoinRackListener.coinRemoved(CoinRackSimulator rack, Coin coin)
      Announces that the indicated coin has been added to the indicated coin rack.
      void CoinChannelSimulator.deliver(Coin coin)
      Moves the indicated coin to the sink.
      void DeliveryChuteSimulator.loadWithoutEvents(Coin... coins)
      Permits the delivery chute to be loaded with items without causing events to be announced.
      void CoinReceptacleSimulator.loadWithoutEvents(Coin... coins)
      Loads the indicated coins into the receptacle without causing events to be announced.
      void CoinRackSimulator.loadWithoutEvents(Coin... coins)
      Allows a set of coins to be loaded into the rack without events being announced.
      void CoinSlotListener.validCoinInserted(CoinSlotSimulator coinSlotSimulator, Coin coin)
      An event announcing that the indicated, valid coin has been inserted and successfully delivered to the storage device connected to the indicated coin slot.
